TopicTitle: Move navigation controller with mouse combo?

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, this is my first post. Not sure where this post should go though...

Quick intro of myself,

I'm a long time lurker in the forums, started my KSP journey and forums lurking back in beginning of 2015.

Anyway, yesterday I saw this thread on another forum where this guy is using PS3 move navigation controller (the side without the ball) together with gaming mouse for first person shooter game.

I was thinking....is it possible to do the same in KSP? Imagine analog vessel movement with mouse screen control... and the small size means I can bring it with me on all my overseas trips. (Extreme 3D pro too big to carry around) I can't locate one at a store near me, might have to order online...

Can any kind soul with a PS 3 move navigation controller please give it a little spin?Thanks!

PS: loving the fan fic and mission report section XD
